about.title: About me
about.primary: I am a self-taught Front-End Developer.  I'm passionate about website architecture, design, and user experience, and I love creating beautiful, responsive, and user-friendly websites that make an impact.
about.secondary: My current skill set includes HTML, CSS, SCSS, JavaScript, React, Bootstrap, as well as some familiarity with Node.js and MongoDB.  I'm always looking for ways to improve my skills and stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in frontend development.

projects.title: Simple twitter
projects.description: Simple Twitter is a collaborative project where I worked on the frontend using React and SCSS. It involved building a user-friendly registration and login system, allowing users to tweet and explore others' tweets. I implemented features like profile customization, including avatar uploads. The project required extensive API integration for seamless communication with the backend.

projects.title: CRWN-clothing
projects.description: CRWN-clothing is a captivating e-commerce project built with React, SCSS, and Firebase. I have developed a responsive and interactive user interface that enhances the shopping experience. It offers a wide range of clothing, allowing users to browse and add items to their cart. and users can securely log in using their Google accounts. With the integration of Firebase, CRWN-clothing provides authentication, real-time database functionality.

projects.title: STAR-GUIDE
projects.description: Star Guide, is a restaurant search website that provides detailed information about restaurants. It allows users to search for restaurants based on keywords and categories. Additionally, users can subscribe to receive updates and information from the website by providing their email addresses.The project is built using Node.js, Handlebars, and Bootstrap.The project enhances the user experience by fetching restaurant images through an API and implementing pagination for displaying restaurants on multiple pages.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: This is where you can describe about your contact. The more you describe about your contact, the more chances you have!
